meanings.definition: The quality or state of being jetty.
meanings.sent1: The jettinesses of the dock made it easy to tie up the boat.
meanings.sent2: The jettinesses of the cliff provided a stunning view of the ocean below.
meanings.sent3: The jettinesses of the pier made it look like a giant finger pointing out to sea.
meanings.sent4: The jettinesses of the building gave it a sense of strength and stability.
meanings.sent5: The jettinesses of the tree roots created a maze-like pattern on the forest floor.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of projecting or extending outward.
meanings.sent1: The jettinesses of the balcony allowed for a great view of the city.
meanings.sent2: The jettinesses of the shelf made it perfect for displaying collectibles.
meanings.sent3: The jettinesses of the awning made it look like a giant umbrella.
meanings.sent4: The jettinesses of the mountain range stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent5: The jettinesses of the branches reached out like welcoming arms towards the sky.
